text: is the name of a Japanese artificial satellite which was put into orbit. The launch was a project of the Institute of Space and Astronautical Science of the University of Tokyo. The satellite was sent into orbit on February 5, 1987.JAXA, "Catalogue of ISAS Missions" ; retrieved 2012-4-16. == References == == Other websites == * Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA), Ginga (Astro-C) mission profile Category:Japanese satellites Category:1980s in spaceflight
title: Ginga (satellite)
